casebody.data:
No. —, original.

In the Matter of the Petition of Committee for Industrial Organization, American Civil Liberties Union, et al., for a Writ of Mandamus *572and/or Prohibition, v. Hon. J. Warren Davis, Hon. Joseph Buffington, Hon. J. Whitaker Thompson, Hon. Albert Branson Maris, and Hon. John Biggs, Jr., United States Circuit Judges of the Third Judicial Circuit; and Committee for Industrial Organization, American Civil Liberties Union, et al. v. Hague et al.

No. —.

November 21, 1938.

Motion for leave to file petition for a writ of mandamus and/or prohibition, for a rule to show cause why a writ of certiorari should not issue, and for interim stay, denied without prejudice to a petition for writ of certiorari in accordance with the Rules of this Court.
